comments.body: Technically this function should only be generic when `fn` is provided. Otherwise it really only safely works on `ReadonlyArray<string>`s and `ReadonlyArray<number>`s.  I'd probably make overloads to model this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@    arr: ReadonlyArray<T>,
    val: T,
    fn?: null | ((itm: T, val: T, m: any, arr: ReadonlyArray<T>) => number),
    ths?: any,
    bgn?: number,
